page.title: 18A Child's Day (Age 9)
page.content: "In the morning I get up from under my duvet and downstairs for{breakfast of {cereal and toast.}I get dressed and I go to join my friends to go to school. {Mummy and Daddy go to work.}When I get to{school}the buzzer goes and we line up to go into class. Register is called and then we go to assembly where we sing and have a story. Then lesson time where we have maths, English, topic, games and crafts. We have two fifteen minute breaks and an hour ten minutes for lunch. For lunch I have{crisps and sandwiches.}At 3.30 I go home and watch children's television or go out to play with my friends. Mummy and Daddy are both home by 5.30.{We have tea at 6.00.}I have a wash and get ready in my pyjamas and watch television till{I go to bed {about 8.30 p.m."
